skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zen meditation
des:
Zen Meditation is a relaxing music for Yoga, Massage, Meditation or Sleep. Relax your mind and body with this skill.

Enhance your relaxation, meditation, sleep, brain function and concentration.


How to use "Zen Meditation: Relaxing Music | Free loop"?

You can say:

- "Alexa, open Zen Meditation"
- "Alexa, start Zen Meditation"
- "Alexa, play Zen Meditation"

It will automatically play the music indefinitely until you say "Alexa, stop".


How to set a timer?

First, you need to play the music using one of the above method. Then, you can limit the time the music will play by saying "Alexa, stop playing in 1 hour" (or however long you want it to last). Once 1 hour has passed, the music will stop playing.


How to support us?

Your review is extremely important and it shows us your support. Please consider leaving a review if you love the skill. Your review encourages us to continue making more skills.


Listen to more relaxing music?

You can say "Alexa, open Zen Meditation and send me other relaxing music" and the skill will send you an email containing other relaxing music you can try. It won't only contain the name of the skill but also, contain direct link to the skill and you can enable it easily.

Or, you can search in the Alexa Skill store the following skills:

- Zen Spa
- Forest Birdsong
- Forest Birds
- Study Music
- Zen Meditation
- Beautiful Piano
- Forest Campfire
- Stress Relief
- Tropical Birds
- Waves Sandy Beach
- Morning Tweet Tweet
- Focus Music
- Cave Water Drips
- Public Park
- Tribal Festival
